snippet.title: Schoolgirl murder accused to face trial
snippet.content: THE man accused of killing schoolgirl Jayde Kendall will face trial in September. Brenden Jacob Bennetts, 19, is charged with one count of murder and one of interfering with a corpse. on August 14, 2015. Her body was found on a property in Upper Tenthill, south of Gatton, two weeks later. Bennetts, 18, who owned a car Jayde was last seen getting into, was arrested and charged with murder shortly after Jayde's body was found. He faced a brief hearing in the Brisbane Supreme Court on Thursday. His trial is due to start on September 4.
